title: pOdum pOdumkaNNA inda bhuvanamengum
sahitya:
pOdum pOdum kaNNA inda bhuvanamengum indra jAlam sheyyum mOhana muraLi gAnam


anupallavi

  nAda mayamAgi gIta mayamAgi inda jnyAlamengum indra jAlam sheyyum mOhana muraLi gAnam


caraNam    vIDu tirumba vENDAmO vITTin kaivElai tIra vENDAmO kaNNA 
mADu karakka vENDAmO engaL mAmiyAr tEDum munnE manai pOga vENDAmO
